pages.text: Turquoise crystals exist as is inside of the Turquoise Ores. Sadly due to our current understanding of Turquoise and its processing, we can only extract a small amount of powder from $(thing)smelting$() of the $(item)Turquoise Ore$().
As you can see here, smelting of the Ore is really inefficient as is at this moment in time.
Through Chotto's dragon magic, we are able to recreate the powder of the broken gems into full gems again, albeit very inefficient.

pages.title: Turquoise Storage
pages.text: Not useful for any processes known to us at this point in time, it proves an incredible way to store crystals in a more compact manner.
